segments.text: Good morning . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to rent a car , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . Full-size , mid-size or compact , ma'am ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 78 dollars a day with unlimited mileage .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And I'd like to have insurance just in case .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you want full coverage insurance , it will be 8 dollars per day . It includes collision damage waiver and personal accident insurance .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here is our brochure , ma'am . Err ... full-size ... OK . Please choose a model in this section .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . How many days would you like to use it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I see your driver's license and credit card please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is the international driving licence fine ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is . ( ... ) Thank you . Please fill in this form . Can you check this box , and put your initials here , and again here .
segments.speaker: S1
